title: (x) Retro Font ID Help! / bold monolinear semi-connected script - LET Santa Fe {Florian}
content:
Does anyone know this font? I am needing it to complete a proof today.  
Thanks in advance  
Erin Z

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [MWM\_head\_mwm3.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040419/http:/typophile.com/files/MWM_head_mwm3.gif) | 25.36 KB |
author: Erin Z

comments.content:
Hi Erin,  
that’s [LET Santa Fe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040419/http:/www.identifont.com/list?2+santa%20fe+0+3HB+251+676+88+675+0) by [David Quay](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Quay). Seems to [temporarily unavailable](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040419/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/David+Quay/)?  
F
